key.name: enable-global-trans
key.summary: Enable the use of a global trans installation
key.description: If true, a global trans installation is used, else a local version.

key.name: enable-selection
key.description: Use current selection instead of clipboard on notifications and menu. Only on X.org (No Wayland-Support)

key.name: enable-notification-translate-options
key.summary: Enable the use of different parameters on notification translation
key.description: If true, it uses different Command-Parameters on notifications

key.name: notification-translate-options
key.description: Command-Parameter to translate the string on notifications

key.name: translate-with-notification
key.description: Key to translate current selection and show the result in a Notification

key.name: translate-from-selection
key.description: Key to toggle the translate menu with selected text
